quote: Logan felt raw inside from the look of betrayal she had leveled on him. Who was he to demand honesty when every aspect of his presence in her life, even on the periphery, was a lie?
quote_letters: LOGAN FELT RAW INSIDE FROM THE LOOK OF BETRAYAL SHE HAD LEVELED ON HIM WHO WAS HE TO DEMAND HONESTY WHEN EVERY ASPECT OF HIS PRESENCE IN HER LIFE EVEN ON THE PERIPHERY WAS A LIE
